data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
data.editorText: refl,

data.lean: lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
data.editorText:
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with h hk,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw hk,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with k hk,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hk,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hk,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw add_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw succ_add,
rw hk,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw succ_add,
rw hk,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
induction c with k hk,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw succ_add,
rw hk,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with k hk,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hk,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
induction m with k hk,
rw zero_mul,
refl,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
induction m with k hk,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw succ_eq_add_one,
rw hk,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hk,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with k hk,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_add,
rw hk,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hk,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_right_comm,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction t with k hk,
repeat{rw mul_zero},
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_comm,
rw hk,
simp,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_mul,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw succ_mul,
rw hk,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with k hk,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_add,
rw mul_add,
rw hk,
rw mul_comm,
rw add_comm,
rw mul_comm,
rw add_comm,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_zero,
rw one_mul,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with k hk,
rw pow_zero,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw hk,
rw one_mul,
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
rw add_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_one,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw hk,
simp,

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
repeat {rw pow_zero},
rw mul_one,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw hk,
simp,

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rw pow_zero,
refl,
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hk,
rw pow_add,
refl,

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
repeat {rw pow_zero},
repeat {rw one_mul},
repeat {rw succ_mul},
repeat {rw mul_add},
rw zero_mul,
rw zero_add,
repeat {rw add_mul},
simp,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: example : mynat → mynat :=
data.editorText:
intro n,
exact 3*n+2,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
have j : Q → R := f p,
exact j(h(p))

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
exact h(f(p)),

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
apply h,
apply f,
exact p,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact a,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
exact p,

lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t : T := j(q),
have u : U := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros f h p,
apply f,
exact p,
apply h,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro hpq,
intro hqr,
intro p,
apply hqr,
apply hpq,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
repeat {rw not_iff_imp_false},
intro p,
intro q,
intro f,
apply q,
apply p,
exact f,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
cc,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact p,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
split,
exact q,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intros p q,
split,
cases p with p q,
exact p,
cases q with q r,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with hpq hqp,
intro qr,
split,
cases qr with q r,
intro p,
apply q,
apply hpq,
exact p,
cases qr with q r,
intro x,
apply hqp,
apply r,
exact x,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with hpq hqp,
intro qr,
split,
cases qr with q r,
intro p,
apply q,
apply hpq,
exact p,
cases qr with q r,
intro x,
apply hqp,
apply r,
exact x,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro q,
right,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
cases p with p q,
right,
exact p,
left,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h,
cases h with p q,
cases q with q r,
left,
split,
exact p,
exact q,
right,
split,
exact p,
exact r,
intro p,
cases p with q r,
cases q with p q,
split,
exact p,
left,
exact q,
cases r with p r,
split,
exact p,
right,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw not_iff_imp_false at h,
cases h with p f,
exfalso,
apply f,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
by_cases p : P; by_cases q : Q,
repeat {cc},

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
apply succ_inj,
rw hs,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
apply succ_inj,
apply succ_inj,
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
intro hab,
rw hab,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact succ_inj,
exact succ_eq_succ_of_eq,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction t with k hk,
repeat {rw add_zero at h},
exact h,
rw hk,
refl,
apply succ_inj,
exact h,

data.lean: theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm t,
rw add_comm t,
exact add_right_cancel a t b,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact add_right_cancel a t b,
intro a,
rw a,
refl,

data.lean: lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction a with k hk,
rw zero_add at h,
apply h,
rw  succ_add at h,
apply hk,
apply succ_inj,
apply h,

data.lean: theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
symmetry,
exact zero_ne_succ a,

data.lean: lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with d,
refl,
rw add_succ at H,
exfalso,
have p := succ_ne_zero (a + d),
have q := p(H),
exact q,

data.lean: lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw add_comm,
apply add_left_eq_zero,

data.lean: theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
apply zero_ne_succ,
intro h,
symmetry at h,
rw succ_eq_add_one at h,
have h1 := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self(h),
rw one_eq_succ_zero at h1,
symmetry at h1,
have h2 := zero_ne_succ 0,
exact h2(h1),

data.lean: theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
intros h p f,
cases b with x,
rw mul_zero at f,
exact p(f),
rw mul_succ at f,
have h1 := add_left_eq_zero f,
exact h(h1),

data.lean:
theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases a,
left,
refl,
right,
rw succ_mul at h,
have h1 := add_left_eq_zero h,
exact h1,

data.lean: theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h,
apply eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero,
exact h,
intro a,
cases a with c hc,
rw c,
rw zero_mul,
refl,
rw hc,
rw mul_zero,
refl,

data.lean: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd generalizing b,
intro a,
rw mul_zero at a,
rw mul_eq_zero_iff at a,
cases a with a b,
exfalso,
exact ha(a),
exact b,
intro h,
cases b,
rw mul_zero at h,
symmetry at h,
rw mul_eq_zero_iff at h,
cases h with a,
exfalso,
cases ha(a),
rw h,
refl,
rw mul_succ at h,
rw mul_succ at h,
apply succ_eq_succ_of_eq,
rw add_right_cancel_iff at h,
have h1 := hd(b),
apply h1,
exact h,

data.lean: lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use 1,
rw add_comm 1 x,

data.lean: lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
data.editorText:
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use 0,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw le_iff_exists_add at h,
cases h with c hc,
rw le_iff_exists_add,
rw succ_eq_add_one,
use c + 1,
rw hc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
cases a with b,
refl,
use b + 1,
rw succ_eq_add_one,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
data.editorText:
cases hab with b hb,
cases hbc with c hc,
rw le_iff_exists_add,
rw hc,
rw hb,
use b + c,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
data.editorText:
cases hab with c hc,
cases hba with d hd,
rw hc at hd,
rw add_assoc at hd,
symmetry at hd,
have h1 := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self hd,
have h2 := add_right_eq_zero h1,
rw h2 at hc,
rw hc,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases h with c hc,
symmetry at hc,
have h1 := add_right_eq_zero hc,
rw h1,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
data.editorText:
cases h with c hc,
rw le_iff_exists_add,
rw hc,
use c,
rw succ_add,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
revert a,
induction b with k hk,
intro a,
right,
exact zero_le a,
intro a,
cases a with c hc,
left,
exact zero_le (succ k),
cases hk c,
left,
apply succ_le_succ,
exact h,
right,
apply succ_le_succ,
exact h,

data.lean: lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
data.editorText:
apply le_succ,
refl,

data.lean: theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
data.editorText:
intro t,
intro h,
cases t with c hc,
rw hc,
use c,
simp,

data.lean: theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with c hc,
rw le_iff_exists_add,
rw succ_add at hc,
rw succ_eq_succ_iff at hc,
rw hc,
use c,
refl,

data.lean: theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with c hc,
rw succ_eq_add_one at hc,
rw add_assoc at hc,
symmetry at hc,
have h1 := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self hc,
rw add_comm at h1,
rw add_one_eq_succ at h1,
have h2 := succ_ne_zero c,
exact h2(h1),

data.lean:
theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :
  t + a ≤ t + b :=
data.editorText:
cases h with c hc,
cases t with d hd,
rw zero_add,
rw zero_add,
rw hc,
use c,
refl,
rw hc,
use c,
rw add_assoc,
refl,

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
cases a with c hc,
cases c with d hd,
cases d with n hn,
exfalso,
rw add_zero at hd,
apply hc,
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use 0,
rw add_zero,
rw hd,
refl,
rw add_succ at hd,
rw hd,
use n,
rw succ_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
split,
cases h with c hc,
cases a with x,
exact zero_le b,
rw succ_eq_add_one at hc,
rw le_iff_exists_add,
use c + 1,
rw hc,
rw add_assoc,
rw add_comm c,
refl,

intro a,
cases h with d hd,
rw hd at a,
cases a with n hn,
rw succ_eq_add_one at hn,
rw add_assoc at hn,
rw add_assoc at hn,
symmetry at hn,
have h1 := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self hn,
symmetry at h1,
rw add_comm at h1,
rw add_one_eq_succ at h1,
symmetry at h1,
have h2 := succ_ne_zero (d + n),
exact h2(h1),

data.lean: lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact lt_aux_one a b,
exact lt_aux_two a b,
